name: Animal Zoo - Wonder Craft
description:
Get this unforgettable experience of having more than just one pet at once – craft your own pocket zoo! With our new Animal Zoo - Wonder Craft game you’ll be able to start with just a couple of simple animals and the common zoo location, and soon you may become… a real zoo owning magnate! Enjoy this management-and-care tycoon!

Animal Zoo - Wonder Craft features:
• Amazing zoo management tycoon
• Awesome animals to pet and take care of
• Colorful simple surroundings – just upgrade them
• Many nice decorations for the zoo
• Interesting emotions for every species
• Great training for your responsibility level
• Fascinating 3D graphics

Become a rich master of zoo craft management with our awesome Animal Zoo - Wonder Craft game! Make all your animals happy feeding them in time and watch new families growing!
